CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Different numbers of thienyl ( T ) as spacers were introduced along the copolymer main chain to investigate the effect on optical , electrochemical and photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Thienyl (T): This is the material being studied in the paragraph, and it is mentioned multiple times as a "spacer" along the copolymer main chain.
2. Copolymer: This is the material that the thienyl molecules are introduced into, and it is the main component of the paragraph.
3. Optical: This is a property of the material, referring to its ability to transmit or reflect light.
4. Electrochemical: This is another property of the material, referring to its ability to conduct electricity in an electrochemical reaction.
5. Photovoltaic: This is a property of the material, referring to its ability to convert light into electrical energy.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* Thienyl (T)
* Copolymer

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Thienyl (T)

I apologize for any confusion earlier. Let me know if you have any other questions!

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Thienyl (T) |
